text: a daivadutanmaril cilare nam marrullavarekkal ‎srestharakkiyirikkunnu. allahu neril ‎sansariccavar avarilunt. marrucilare avan ‎visistamaya cila padavikalilekkuyarttiyirikkunnu. ‎maryaminre makan yesuvin nam vyaktamaya ‎atayalannal nalki. parisud'dhatmavinal ‎addehatte prabalanakki. allahu icchiccirunnenkil ‎avarute pinmurakkar avarkk vyaktamaya teliv ‎vannettiyasesavum parasparam pearutumayirunnilla. ‎ennal avar parasparam bhinniccu. avaril ‎visvasiccavarunt. satyanisedhikalumunt. allahu ‎icchiccirunnenkil avar tam'milatikkumayirunnilla. ‎pakse, allahu avanicchikkunnat ceyyunnu. ‎
